nodes.text: Bescat Offdurmin was a holo-entertainment mogul and pleasure-seeker from the Corporate Sector. He was the original owner of the Love Commander, which he lost in a game of sabacc to Lando Calrissian. His drunkenness at the time may have contributed to his loss. Lando later used Bescat's name as an alias while he, Han Solo and Leia Organa Solo made use of the Love Commander.
